mapper.select: SELECT FACTORY_ID,FACTORY_NAME from factory_c WHERE CTYPE=#{ctype} AND STATE=#{state}

select * from factory_c
CONTACTS like CONCAT('%',#{text},'%')
and FULL_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{f_type},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE factory_c SET state=#{state} WHERE FACTORY_ID=#{factoryId}
mapper.select:
select * from factory_c
CONTACTS like CONCAT('%',#{text},'%')
and FULL_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{f_type},'%')
LIMIT #{currentPageNo},5

SELECT count(1) as count FROM factory_c
CONTACTS like CONCAT('%',#{text},'%')
and FULL_NAME LIKE concat('%',#{f_type},'%')
